Translations.Text: and by the night when she spreads her darkness
your Lord has not forsaken you,ยน nor does He abhor you
The life to come holds a richer prize for you than this present life
and you shall be gratified with what your Lord will give you
Did He not find you an orphan and give you shelter
And did He not find you in error and guide you
And did He not find you poor and enrich you
Therefore do not wrong the orphan
But proclaim the goodness of your Lord
